                        .:: P L O T ::.                        
                             ~~~~~~~                             
          Glory recounts the bravery of a group of               
          Civil War soldiers often overlooked by                 
          history--the 54th Regiment of Massachusetts,           
           a troop of free black men who fought to help            
            win liberty for their enslaved brothers.                 
                                                                     
                                                                   
                          .:: C A S T ::.                          
                             ~~~~~~~                             
            Matthew Broderick.....: Col. Robert Gould Shaw           
         Denzel Washington.....: Pvt. Trip                     
      Cary Elwes............: Maj. Cabot Forbes          
         Morgan Freeman........: Sgt. Maj. John Rawlins        
                                                                     
                                                                 
                                                                   
                         .:: N O T E S ::.                         
                              ~~~~~~~~~
